comments.comments_text: The resulting corner from Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (Napoli) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Napoli.

comments.comments_text: Napoli earn a free kick which could lead to a goal-scoring opportunity. Frank Anguissa (Napoli) has to be very careful for the rest of the match after receiving a yellow card from the referee for a bad tackle on an opponent.

comments.comments_text: Ricardo Horta (Braga) takes a shot from the edge of the box, but it's not a big threat for the goalkeeper as his effort is blocked by a defender. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Braga will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Victor Osimhen (Napoli) was probably a bit loose with his words to Serdar Gozubuyuk, who decides to show him a yellow.
